commit.message:
Allow to fetch hive s3 mappings via http/s url

Support loading of s3 mappings via http/s url to be compatible with
secret-storage solutions like vault. The hive.s3.security-mapping
.config-file property can now either point to a local file or a URL.
Furthermore, add a JSON pointer attribute (hive.s3.security-mapping
.json-pointer) for specifying a pointer (RFC-6901) inside the JSON file
or result to get the mappings from.
